mapper.select: SELECT region.id, region.name, IFNULL(meetingCount.num,0) AS num, region.deletedAt FROM region LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT regionId, COUNT(regionId) AS num FROM meeting GROUP BY regionId ) AS meetingCount ON region.id = meetingCount.regionId LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
SELECT r.id, r.name FROM region AS r WHERE r.deletedAt IS NULL
